## Pre-submission Checklist

- [ ] Code follows project style guidelines (`npm run lint` passes)
- [ ] Build completes successfully (`npm run build` passes)
- [ ] Tests pass (`npm test` passes)
- [ ] API sync check passes (`npm run check-api` passes)
- [ ] Self-review completed (checked for obvious errors)
- [ ] Documentation updated (if needed)
  - [ ] JSDoc comments added for new functions
  - [ ] README.md updated (if public API changed)
  - [ ] CHANGELOG.md updated (if user-facing changes)
- [ ] PR title clearly describes the change
- [ ] Commits have clear messages
